titleStmt.title: The root of apostacy, and fountain of true fortitude. Delivered in a sermon before rhe [sic] Honourable House of Commons, on their late day of thanks-giving for the great victory given to Sir William Waller and the forces with him, against the army of Sir Ralph Hopton. By Thomas Case, Preacher at Milk-street, London, and one of the Assembly of Divines.
titleStmt.author: Case, Thomas, 1598-1682.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. R. for Luke Fawne, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Churchyard, at the signe of the Parrot,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Churchyard, at the signe of the Parrot
